Articles.Content: I don’t know if anyone else here plays the game moonbase alpha (now known as the game where people abuse text-to-speech on the moon), but the point of the game is to fix a base that NASA set up on the moon when an asteroid crashed into it. So I started thinking, why not do this in ksp? So I went out and built a settlement on the moon and crashed a class A asteroid into it. The results are amazing, I recommend trying it! But the point of the challenge is to recreate this base that the game uses as a map. It should have one settlement and have solar power buildings and a rover. It should all be stock without mods or expansion packs. Happy crashing!
